verbose_text: In this study, lesion size was determined by the percentage of atherosclerotic lesions compared to the entire cross-sectional vessel lumen area stained with H & E. There was only a small amount of foam cells in the aortic sinuses of apoE -/- mice fed a high-cholesterol diet for 2 weeks, but P2X7R expression in the atherosclerotic lesions was significantly increased (XREF_FIG) compared with the control group (on a chow diet for 1 week).
